article_title: Chinese investors bet heavy on art
article_text: With stock and property markets on shaky ground, investors in China and Hong Kong are pouring money into art. But as Farah Master reports, few if any of these pieces will end up hanging above the fireplace.

article_summary:
With stock and property markets on shaky ground, investors in China and Hong Kong are pouring money into art.
But as Farah Master reports, few if any of these pieces will end up hanging above the fireplace.
